thread.title: More shakeups at Gap Inc. brands
thread.title_full: More shakeups at Gap Inc. brands - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Tony Bravo
title: More shakeups at Gap Inc. brands
text:
Photo: Philip Montgomery, Special To The Chronicle Manhattan, New York - A group of models pose during the Banana Republic Presentation at Glasgow Caledonian University for the Mercedes-Benz New York Fashion Week Fall 2015. Saturday, February 14, 2014. Manhattan, New York - A group of models pose during the Banana...
Marissa Webb is stepping down from her position as creative director at Banana Republic after 18 months with the brand, it was reported this week. The news comes on the heels of a report from parent company Gap Inc. released Thursday that sales were down 10 percent for September 2015 versus a positive 2 percent gain last year. Similiar to Gap’s dismissal of creative director Rebekka Bay in January, the company is opting not to replace Webb, instead eliminating the position and replacing it with a design team. According to reports by Women’s Wear Daily, Webb is not leaving the company entirely and will continue to be a “creative adviser” at Banana Republic. Gap Inc. retains a minority stake in Webb’s eponymous label. Manhattan, New York - A group of models pose during the Banana Republic Presentation at Glasgow Caledonian University for the Mercedes-Benz New York Fashion Week Fall 2015. Saturday, February 14, 2014. Manhattan, New York - A group of models pose during the Banana...
Marissa Webb is stepping down from her position as creative director at Banana Republic after 18 months with the brand, it was reported this week. The news comes on the heels of a report from parent company Gap Inc. released Thursday that sales were down 10 percent for September 2015 versus a positive 2 percent gain last year. Similiar to Gap’s dismissal of creative director Rebekka Bay in January, the company is opting not to replace Webb, instead eliminating the position and replacing it with a design team. According to reports by Women’s Wear Daily, Webb is not leaving the company entirely and will continue to be a “creative adviser” at Banana Republic. Gap Inc. retains a minority stake in Webb’s eponymous label.
